statements: UPDATE user_profile SET full_name = 'John Doe', email_address = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE knowledge_base SET content = 'Updated article content. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam ultricies ligula in nisi varius, quis lobortis justo feugiat. Vestibulum fermentum tristique sem a fringilla.' WHERE article_id = '456e89b1-23d4-456a-a874-146818426500'
